message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this unique product with you. I believe it has tremendous value and I'm looking to find the right buyer who can appreciate it. I'm open to negotiations, but I do want to start with a price that reflects its true worth. My initial offer is $1200000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value and the unique features of the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was hoping to get a bit closer to my initial asking price. Considering the unique features and the potential it has, I'm willing to meet you halfway. My revised offer is $1050000. I believe it's a fair price that reflects the product's value and your interest in it.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit concerned about the price. I'm willing to go up to $950000, which is a compromise between my previous offer and your revised offer. I believe this price is more in line with my budget and the market value of the product.

I understand that you're trying to find a price that works for you, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to get closer to my initial asking price. My revised offer is $1050000 is a bit too high, so I'll meet you in the middle of that and my previous offer. My new offer is $1025000. I believe this is a fair price that balances your concerns with the product's value.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm willing to meet you in the middle of our previous offers. My revised offer is $975000. I believe this price is a fair reflection of the product's value and my budget.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, Bob. However, I'm still not comfortable with $975000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'll meet you at $990000, which is the midpoint between $975000 and my previous offer. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the product's value and your interest in it.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $980000. I believe this price is a fair reflection of the product's value and my budget. I'm willing to make a serious offer at this price.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one final concession. I'll meet you at $985000, which is just $5000 above your last offer. I believe this is the best price we can both agree on, considering the product's value and your budget. I'm willing to call it a day at this price.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $980000. I believe this price is a fair reflection of the product's value and my budget. I'm willing to accept this price as a final offer.
